name: mobx-state-tree-ts
description: Better typescript type definitions for mobx-state-tree

scripts.test: npm run clean:tests && npm run build:tests && node tests-dist/tests/test.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:tests
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:tests
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run clean-build
